{"id":1185378380,"question_id":3325,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"2 weeks, 2 days","timestamp":1708831445,"status":11,"status_display":"Wrong Answer","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/1185378380/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Find the Largest Area of Square Inside Two Rectangles","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    using ll = long long;\n    using pii = pair<int, int>;\n    using vi = vector<int>;\n    \n    int common(vi bL0, vi tR0, vi bL1, vi tR1){\n        if(bL0[0] > tR1[0] || bL1[0] > tR0[0]) return -1;\n        if(bL0[1] > tR1[1] || bL1[1] > tR0[1]) return -2;\n        int ans = 0;\n        int x[4] = {bL0[0], tR0[0], bL1[0], tR1[0]};\n        int y[4] = {bL0[1], tR0[1], bL1[1], tR1[1]};\n        sort(x, x + 4);\n        sort(y, y + 4);\n        ans = min(x[2] - x[1], y[2] - y[1]);\n        return ans;\n    }\n    \n    long long largestSquareArea(vector<vector<int>>& bottomLeft, vector<vector<int>>& topRight) {\n        int n = bottomLeft.size();\n        vector<vector<int>> rect;\n        for(int i = 0; i < n; i++){\n            rect.push_back({bottomLeft[i][0], bottomLeft[i][1], topRight[i][0], topRight[i][1]});\n        }\n        sort(rect.begin(), rect.end());\n        \n        int ans = 0;\n        int i = 0, j = 1;\n        while(j < n){\n            int c = common({rect[i][0], rect[i][1]}, {rect[i][2], rect[i][3]}, {rect[j][0], rect[j][1]}, {rect[j][2], rect[j][3]});\n            if(ans > -1)ans = max(ans, c), j++;\n            else{\n                if(ans == -1) i++;\n            }\n        }\n        return ll(ans) * ll(ans);\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"find-the-largest-area-of-square-inside-two-rectangles","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
